original_text: though they were not yet born and had done nothing either good or bad—in order that God's purpose of election might continue, not because of works but because of him who calls—
korean_text: 그 자식들이 아직 나지도 아니하고 무슨 선이나 악을 행하지 아니한 때에 택하심을 따라 되는 하나님의 뜻이 행위로 말미암지 않고 오직 부르시는 이로 말미암아 서게 하려 하사

sentences.original_text: though they were not yet born
and had done nothing either good or bad
sentences.korean_translation: 선하거나 악한 일을 아무것도 하지 않았지만

sentences.original_text: in order that God's purpose of election might continue
but because of him who calls
